pre.style: color: rgb(8 , 8 , 8) ; font-family: "jetbrains mono" , monospace ; font-size: 18px

div.pre:
SELECT avg(total) AS avgScore
FROM (
SELECT
student.id,
( 100 + 80 + score.mathScore + score.englishScore ) AS total
FROM student
JOIN score ON (student.id = score.studentId)
WHERE student.age < 35
) tmp

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
